column1: # description: Hal Higdon: Novice 2: "Novice 2 is designed to fit comfortably between the Novice 1 and Intermediate 1 marathon plans. It is designed for runners who may already have run and finished their first marathon and want to add just a bit more mileage while training for their second or third marathons
column3: perhaps even qualify for the Boston Marathon." (more details at the link below)
